record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - December 06, 2007)

[Page: S15001]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:17 p.m., adjourned until Friday, December 7, 2007, at 9 a.m.
